name: Panda Parkour
description:
You will play as a panda and traverse difficult terrain, collecting as many coins as possible in the process. Every time you successfully reach the end, you can pass the level and you will be scored according to the gold coins you collect. The rating is divided into 3 levels: "1 star", "2 stars" and "3 stars".

Game Features

  • The game is free to play
  • 9 different levels
  • In operation, you only need to use the mouse to control the panda to jump, which is very suitable for lazy people to play
  • Rich scoring system, you will get corresponding scores at the end of each level, and the main interface will calculate your overall score based on the scores of all levels
